title: Decision Point & Building Value
objective: Guide guests to a confident decision by clarifying what matters most, translating features into real-life outcomes, and leading a calm, trust-first Decision Point conversation before numbers.
position_in_journey: Emotional Test Drive → Decision Point (Hood Ornament) → Numbers
learning_outcomes: Recognize the Decision Point moment and guide it without pressure.
Summarize the guest’s priorities in their words and confirm fit.
Translate features into outcomes (confidence, comfort, safety, simplicity).
Use a simple value stack that feels factual and respectful.
Use permission-based commitment language (micro-commitments) to maintain trust.
Transition to numbers as a helpful next step—not a confrontation.
